name: Mukbang vs Friday Night Music
description:
MUKBANG VS FNF
A game that is a combination of the hot trend "Mukbang" and "Funny Music Battle".
You will have to defeat different characters in a musical battle to turn into food for yourself.
You won't know your opponents in advance and you won't be able to know what food you will be able to turn them into. With Easy, Nornal, Hard game modes randomly as you meet different opponents.
If you win all, you will enjoy an attractive Mukbang performance.

Wowwww>>>

Interesting, right???
Hope you will like it!!!
